comments:
Description:
Execute(template,values) in class TemplateExecute doesn't process null template.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run attached file text_html_image.xml through ReportRunner.

Expected Result:
No errors.

Actual result:
SEVERE: An error happened while running the report. Cause:
java.lang.NullPointerException

t(LocalizedEmitter.java:345)

This bug is caused by the result of scr 116392 which fails to parse an HTML text
without close tag for IMAGE.
